name: Jamba & Jambe - Out of Control
description:
Jamba & Jambe - Out of Control was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

In this game you are helping two witches, Jamba and Jambe, mixing potions to defeat a monster.

Credits:

  • Art/Pixelart, SideChick
  • Music, RPG Maker MV, Kadokawa
  • Engine, RPG Maker MV, Kadokawa
